segments.text: Oh, look at these two little rascals, they're quite clever!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've clearly planned this cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined, stretching his arm into that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl, with her hand out, is a perfect accomplice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so patient, waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's admirable, in a mischievous way, how they're working together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must think they're being incredibly sneaky right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel their excitement and anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a classic childhood adventure, full of daring and forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The fact that their mother is so close, yet so unaware, adds to the thrill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their innocent rebellion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before the stool tips!
segments.speaker: PAR
